alert.note: Alert for Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 7:51PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ventura County through 815 PM PST... At 751 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles northwest of Ventura, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Ventura... Meiners Oaks... Lake Casitas... Seacliff... and Solimar Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Ventura County Mountains
